newsitem.title: MEXICO: Micare says sold eight mln tonnes of coal in 1996.
newsitem.headline: Micare says sold eight mln tonnes of coal in 1996.

text.p: Minera Carbonifera Rio Escondido (Micare), a subsidairy of the steelmaker Altos Hornos de Mexico, sold about eight million tonnes of thermic coal in 1996, compared with 7.224 million tonnes in 1995, the company said

The company, which operates two open pit mines and three underground mines, made all its sales through the Federal Electricty Commission for two of its power generators, the company said in a statement.
